summary: Junior Java backend developer, self-taught, optimization enthusiast. Experienced in automating processes, analyzing workflows and turning them into code. Detail-oriented, organized, and a collaborative team player with a passion for Java, Spring, and backend technologies.

experience.title: Business Owner

experience.title: C# Software Developer
experience.description: Implemented a software development project from scratch that radically reorganized the work of the entire organization.

experience.title: Stock Market Specialist
